name: landa Accounting
author: landasme

sections.description:
This plugin helps connect your (online) store to landa online accounting software. By using this plugin, saving products, contacts, and orders in your store will also save them automatically in your landa account. Besides that, just after a client pays a bill, the receipt document will be stored in landa as well. Of course, you have to register your account in landa first. To do so, visit landa at the link here www.landa.com and sign up for free. After you signed up and entered your account, choose your business, then in the settings menu/API, you can find the API keys for the business and import them to the plugin settings. Now your module is ready to use.

For more information and a full guide to how to use landa and WooCommerce Plugin, visit landa’s website and go to the “Accounting School” menu.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/landa directory, or install the landa plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->landa screen to configure the plugin

short_description: Connect landa Online Accounting to WooCommerce.

upgrade_notice: Automatic updates should work smoothly, but we still recommend you back up your site.
